task.title: Schedule test suite collection execution on remotely in Katalon Studio

context.p: You can schedule a test suite collection execution on multiple servers with . To learn more about planning and monitoring all test activities in , you can refer to this document here: .

step.cmd: To quickly access the test suite collection scheduling feature of TestOps from , in the test suite collection editor, click on Schedule on Katalon TestOps.

taskbody.result: You are directed to the TestOps Schedule Test Runs page.
